properties.description: Connect Café is a café style space where people are welcome to come and join in hobbies and activities or just sit and chat as they wish. Our focus is on community so anyone can bring an activity or hobby as they like.We have a 'quiet' room, which people can use as they need or wish. We do a short, guided meditation at some point during the afternoon which people can join in if they want to or continue with activities if they prefer.
properties.title: Connect Café
